subject: New review (1★) of Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback (from Markuss P.)

Markuss Palchevskis Display name: Markuss P. i get large motor and small one without power suply. when i order 3 small motors with power suply View, Reply or Share Unpublish review This email is sent for 0a6bb1.myshopify.com Unsubscribe

conversations.body_text: Hi Markuss P.,  We sincerely apologize, it seems there was a packing error from our warehouse. Could you please take a photo of all the motors you received and provide us with your order number? We will arrange to resend the correct motor and power supply to you as soon as possible.

My order was: #SSN2186
And as you can see on my photo i got realy diffirent items. It would be ok
i get 1 big and one small mototr even when i order 3 small but i dont have
power suply. So i cant even get them work :(



пн, 18 авг. 2025 г., 04:37 service@simsonn.com
Hi Loox,    Okay, we will send you a replacement power supply. Here is your logistics tracking link.    https://t.17track.net/en#nums=YT2523400705790463
